p: To select agents for the biological control of M. calvescens, surveys on the arthropods that attack this weed in Brazil have been carried out since 2001 (Pican√ßo et al. 2005; Morais et al. 2010a, 2010b). In these previous studies, some species of Lepidoptera were found damaging M. calvescens, including Salbia lotanalis Druce (Lepidoptera: Pyralidae) (mistakenly identified as Ategumia sp.), Druentia inscita Schaus (Mimallonidae) and Antiblemma leucocyma Hampson (Noctuidae).
